channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s time to buy tech stocks: 4 ways to find winners while the market is down
Federal authorities arrest two judges, in escalation of Trump immigration crackdown
item.description: Federal agents arrested Milwaukee Circuit Court Judge Hannah Dugan on obstruction charges, FBI Director Kash Patel said.

item.title: If a financial adviser wants to roll over your retirement savings, watch out
Yale classmates warn Trump Treasury Secretary Bessent he risks enabling descent 'into fascism'
item.description: A new letter to Scott Bessent accuses President Donald Trump of usurping the authority of Congress and U.S. courts since regaining the White House.

item.title: Trump and Zelenskyy meet one-on-one in Vatican basilica to seek Ukraine peace
item.description: Trump and Zelenskyy met one-on-one in a marble-lined Vatican basilica on Saturday to try to revive faltering efforts to end Russia's war with Ukraine.

item.title: Trump floats tougher Russia sanctions, meets Zelenskyy for first time since Oval Office blowup
item.description: President Donald Trump's Truth Social post comes as he ramps up pressure on Russia and Ukraine to strike a deal to end their war.

item.title: ‘Bond king’ Jeffrey Gundlach predicts our next financial hangover—it's sobering
UK's Reeves talks trade with US's Bessent after stressing EU ties
item.description: British finance minister Rachel Reeves met U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Friday to discuss a trade deal, shortly after saying that improvin...

item.title: What Trump’s next 100 days will mean for taxes, markets and your wallet
Kevin Warsh says the Fed is broken. He’s taking dead aim at Powell’s job.
